pkgmetadata.longdescription: dk - utility classes====================Various basic packages pulled from our source tree... image:: https://travis-ci.org/datakortet/dk.svg :target: https://travis-ci.org/datakortet/dk.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/dk/badge/?version=latest :target: https://readthedocs.org/projects/dk/?badge=latest :alt: Documentation Status.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/datakortet/dk/badge.png?branch=master :target: https://coveralls.io/r/datakortet/dk?branch=master :alt: Test CoverageDocumentation-------------The documentation lives at http://dk.readthedocs.org/Running the tests-------------------I use py.test to run the tests, so there might be some dependencies thatunittest.py by itself can't handle.
